field.name: enabled
field.label: Site in Testmode?
field.description: Put the site in testmode? This will require providing credentials to view the front-end.

field.name: screen_door
field.label: Screen Door active?
field.description: This allows you to access the site without credentials, by providing a passkey in your address bar.

field.name: passkey
field.label: Passkey
field.description: This allows you to access the site without credentials, by providing a key in your address bar. www.examplesite.com/?passkey=set

field.name: testmode_message
field.label: Testmode Message
field.description: This message will be displayed if a user is unable to provide credentials.
field.default: The site you are trying to access is in test mode. Please provide credentials.

field.name: cookie_length
field.label: Cookie Length
field.description: This is the length of time before the access credentials expire. Acceptable formats are +1 week, +1 day, +1 hour, +1 week 2 days 4 hours 2 seconds.
